tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE literature_sources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publication_venue VARCHAR(150)
);

CREATE TABLE sources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publication_venue VARCHAR(255)
);
CREATE TABLE publications (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, publication_date DATE, author TEXT, publication_venue TEXT);
CREATE TABLE authors (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, affiliation TEXT);
CREATE TABLE publication_venues (id INT PRIMARY KEY, venue_name TEXT, city TEXT, country TEXT);

CREATE TABLE sources (
  source_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publication_venue VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE publications (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    author TEXT,
    venue TEXT
);
